about_the_game:
This DLC includes the following items:

①Turnip Fried Rice x 3--This is a consumable item that provides the temporary effect: "Increased Expereince Gained".

②Ruby x 1--This is a consumable item that can be disassembled to obtain "5,000 runes".

*Items included in this set can also be obtained by consuming items available in-game.
*You can only purchase this set once.
detailed_description:
This DLC includes the following items:

①Turnip Fried Rice x 3--This is a consumable item that provides the temporary effect: "Increased Expereince Gained".

②Ruby x 1--This is a consumable item that can be disassembled to obtain "5,000 runes".

*Items included in this set can also be obtained by consuming items available in-game.
*You can only purchase this set once.
